about_the_game:
"The Realm" nicknamed Nexus has created a conduit from another realm to theirs'. Through this tool the gods of Nexus enlist the aid of sentient beings to improve the conduit and save their realm. The conduit anchored itself in a realm where the sentient beings all contain varying amounts of a creation god. The gods of Nexus rejoiced and self granulated the success of their final effort. The gravity of the conduit now bending fate to their likely survival. Revival of their stale unchanged lands falling into the hands of another realm's demi-gods. Little did they know the chaotic nature of those beings, if it was a blessing or a curse, your actions decide.

As a demi god of creation, contribute to the Conduit &/or Nexus and help a dying realm, or use it to help yourself.

Conduit To Nexus is an MMO-RPG, much like many existing rpg's and mmo's before it, it resembles many of the same elements. It is found in medieval high fantasy world with monsters and rogue gods roaming the lands. This game will/does include steam achievements, steam workshop(conduit workshop), steam cloud, stats, async game notifications and soon development scenes for you to contribute to the nexus through unity development.

Join the conduit tool creators, the players, and the world. Create kingdoms or siege them. Find new relics, create your own, become a renowned weapon smith, become the ultimate gladiator. Tame beasts, go on adventures, create the world, build within the world, let people in your village or demand taxes for entry. Live, grow, defeat, befriend, vanquish, conquer, join, fight, and find joy, pride, purpose in your actions.

Use/create the Conduit. Enter/join the Nexus.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is considered violent as some conflict is resolved through hack and slash battle.
